snippet: The 92nd Street Y’s Lyrics & Lyricists series celebrates Arthur Freed, the producer of classic MGM musicals.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Going Hollywood: MGM Musicals, season-opening program of 92nd Street Y's Lyrics & Lyricists series.
lead_paragraph: The 92nd Street Y’s Lyrics & Lyricists series celebrates Arthur Freed, the producer of classic MGM musicals.

headline.seo: Lyrics & Lyricists at 92nd Street Y Celebrates Arthur Freed
headline.main: With a Happy Refrain: MGM’s Magic Era
headline.print_headline: With a Happy Refrain: MGM’s Magic Era
